name: Cold Hell
description:
Cold Hell is a exploration plaformer with some horror elements.

FEATURES:

-English / Portuguese
-Six explorable areas
-Original retro pixel art
-Two endings
-Hide and seek with wolves

-Pixel-art cutscenes

Only pixel-art not made by me (in-game credits too): https://rottingpixels.itch.io/cave-platformer-tileset-16x16free

I'm testing  linux and mac version,  they're  coming soon.
